benchmark_details.name: IndoNLU: Benchmark and Resources for Evaluating Indonesian Natural Language Understanding
benchmark_details.overview: IndoNLU is a comprehensive benchmark for training, evaluation, and benchmarking on Indonesian natural language understanding tasks, consisting of twelve diverse tasks ranging from single sentence classification to pair-sentences sequence labeling.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To establish a standardized benchmark for Indonesian natural language understanding.

data.source: Collection from various existing datasets covering tasks in Indonesian NLP.

methodology.calculation: Calculated using macro-averaged F1 score for classification tasks and word-level sequence labeling F1 score for sequence labeling tasks.
methodology.interpretation: A higher F1 score indicates better model performance on the benchmark tasks.
methodology.baseline_results: Baseline models provided for each task, including IndoBERT and IndoBERT-lite variants.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Privacy measures for data handling are incorporated based on data sources.
